home.welcome: Welcome to VibeSync, the platform that connects you and your event on the same vibe.
home.description: With VibeSync, you can create a Space for your event and share a link so that your audience can choose the songs they want to hear, while you monitor everything in an exclusive detailed dashboard.
home.freePlan: Check out our FREE plan and try this new experience today!

howItWorks.title: How VibeSync works
howItWorks.description: VibeSync transforms musical interaction at events, allowing the audience to actively participate in the playlist. Here's how:

createSpace.title: Create your Space
createSpace.description: Start by creating a unique Space for your event, defining the musical environment.

shareLink.title: Share the Link
shareLink.description: Share the Space link with your audience, inviting them to join the musical experience.

suggestions.title: Musical Suggestions
suggestions.description: The audience suggests songs, adding their favorite tracks to the event playlist.

dashboard.title: Control Panel
dashboard.description: Monitor suggestions in real-time on the admin panel and control your event's vibe.
